cooked:
Mempool design is an interesting theoretical problem. For instance, Mempool Incentive Compatibility

Moreover, privacy and DoS resistance in general are areas with open research questions. For instance, P2P attacks | Bitcoin Core Onboarding
topic_title: What are interesting parts of the Bitcoin Core codebase?
topic_html_title: What are interesting parts of the Bitcoin Core codebase?
raw:
Mempool design is an interesting theoretical problem. For instance, https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/mempool-incentive-compatibility/553#summary-18

Moreover, privacy and DoS resistance in general are areas with open research questions. For instance, https://bitcoincore.academy/p2p-attacks.html
excerpt: Mempool design is an interesting theoretical problem. For instance, Mempool Incentive Compatibility Moreover, privacy and DoS resistance in general are areas with open research questions. For instance, P2P attacks | Bitcoin Core Onboarding
